verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> things <S%G1494><s%> sacrificed <S%G1494><s%> to idols, <S%G1494><s%> we know <S%G3609><s%> that we all <S%G3956><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> knowledge. <S%G1108><s%> Knowledge <S%G1108><s%> makes <S%G5448><s%> arrogant, <S%G5448><s%> but love <S%G26><s%> edifies. <S%G3618><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> supposes <S%G1380><s%> that he knows <S%G1097><s%> anything, <S%G5100><s%> he has not yet <S%G3768><s%> known <S%G1097><s%> as he ought <S%G1163><s%> to know; <S%G1097><s%>
but if <S%G1487><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> loves <S%G25><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> he is known <S%G1097><s%> by Him.

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> the eating <S%G1035><s%> of things <S%G1494><s%> sacrificed <S%G1494><s%> to idols, <S%G1494><s%> we know <S%G3609><s%> that there is no <S%G3762><s%> such thing <S%G3762><s%> as an idol <S%G1497><s%> in the world, <S%G2889><s%> and that there is no <S%G3762><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> but one. <S%G1520><s%>

For even <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1512><s%> there are so-called gods <S%G2316><s%> whether <S%G1535><s%> in heaven <S%G3772><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> on earth, <S%G1093><s%> as indeed <S%G5618><s%> there are many <S%G4183><s%> gods <S%G2316><s%> and many <S%G4183><s%> lords, <S%G2962><s%>

yet <S%G235><s%> for us there is [but] one <S%G1520><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> the Father, <S%G3962><s%> from whom <S%G3739><s%> are all <S%G3956><s%> things, <S%G3956><s%> and we [exist] for Him; and one <S%G1520><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> by whom <S%G3739><s%> are all <S%G3956><s%> things, <S%G3956><s%> and we [exist] through <S%G1223><s%> Him.

However <S%G235><s%> not all <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G3956><s%> have this <S%G3588><s%> knowledge; <S%G1108><s%> but some, <S%G5100><s%> being accustomed <S%G4914><s%> to the idol <S%G1497><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> now, <S%G737><s%> eat <S%G2068><s%> [food] as if <S%G5613><s%> it were sacrificed <S%G1494><s%> to an idol; <S%G1494><s%> and their conscience <S%G4893><s%> being <S%G1510><s%> weak <S%G772><s%> is defiled. <S%G3435><s%>

But food <S%G1033><s%> will not commend <S%G3936><s%> us to God; <S%G2316><s%> we are neither <S%G3777><s%> the worse <S%G5302><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> we do not eat, <S%G2068><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> the better <S%G4052><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> we do eat. <S%G2068><s%>

But take <S%G991><s%> care <S%G991><s%> lest <S%G3381><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> liberty <S%G1849><s%> of yours <S%G4771><s%> somehow <S%G4458><s%> become <S%G1096><s%> a stumbling <S%G4348><s%> block <S%G4348><s%> to the weak. <S%G772><s%>

For if <S%G1437><s%> someone <S%G5100><s%> sees <S%G3708><s%> you, who have <S%G2192><s%> knowledge, <S%G1108><s%> dining <S%G2621><s%> in an idol's temple, <S%G1493><s%> will not his conscience, <S%G4893><s%> if he is weak, <S%G772><s%> be strengthened <S%G3618><s%> to eat <S%G2068><s%> things <S%G1494><s%> sacrificed <S%G1494><s%> to idols <S%G1494><s%>?

For through <S%G1722><s%> your knowledge <S%G1108><s%> he who is weak <S%G770><s%> is ruined, <S%G622><s%> the brother <S%G80><s%> for whose <S%G3739><s%> sake <S%G1223><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> died. <S%G599><s%>

And thus, <S%G3779><s%> by sinning <S%G264><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> the brethren <S%G80><s%> and wounding <S%G5180><s%> their conscience <S%G4893><s%> when it is weak, <S%G770><s%> you sin <S%G264><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Therefore, <S%G1355><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> food <S%G1033><s%> causes <S%G4624><s%> my brother <S%G80><s%> to stumble, <S%G4624><s%> I will never <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3361><s%> eat <S%G2068><s%> meat <S%G2907><s%> again, that I might not cause <S%G4624><s%> my brother <S%G80><s%> to stumble. <S%G4624><s%>
